Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp58
Package it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.controller

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.event.core.EventSource
it.polimi.ingsw.psp58.controller.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllerListener, EventListener
public class Lobby
extends EventSource
implements ControllerListener
Handle the connections to the game, create the Rooms and start PreGame and Game, implements the Singleton Pattern.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.List<Room> activeRooms
    List of the currently active Rooms in this Server
    private java.util.List<java.lang.String> activeUsersList
    List of the currently active users in this Server, stored by their Username (String)
    private java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean canCreateNewRoom
    AtomicBoolean variable that help to synchronize the creation of a Room.
    private java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock creatingRoomLock
    Lock the creation of the Room and the access to canCreateNewRoom.
    private static java.lang.String EXCEPTION_MESSAGE
    Message to show when there's an exception
    private static Lobby instance
    Single instance of Lobby
    private static int MAX_ROOMS
    Number of maximum Rooms in this server
    private java.lang.String pendingUsername
    Username of the player that is creating the Room, stored until the VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent event arrives
    private VirtualView pendingVirtualView
    VirtualView of the player that is creating the Room, stored until the VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent event arrives
    private int roomCounter
    Number of active Rooms, for LogMessage purpose

    • createInstance

      private static void createInstance()
      Private method: it creates the object if it doesn't exist.

    • instance

      public static Lobby instance()
      Public method that return the unique instance of Lobby. It calls the synchronized and private method only if the object doesn't exist. If the object is already created, the method only return the instance of the object.
      Returns:
      Return the Instance of Lobby

    • handleClientDisconnected

      public void handleClientDisconnected​(java.lang.String username)
      This method disconnect the given Username from the server and, if the player was in a Room, clean the Room too. This method is called only if the server saved the username in the username List.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the player that lost the connection.

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent event)
      This method handle a CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent and admit the client to the Lobby. If the username is already taken the method send a CV_ConnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent to the client with errorCode: "USER_TAKEN". If the server is full (no rooms available) the method send a CV_ConnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent to the client with errorCode: "ROOM_FULL". If another player is creating a Room the method send a CV_ConnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent to the client with errorCode: "WAIT_FOR_CREATION". If every room is full but the server can manage a new room, the method send a CV_RoomSizeRequestGameEvent to the client asking the desired size of the room. If there's an available Room, the method add the client to the Room.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - A CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent with the info about the client.

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent event)
      This method create a new Room with the desired size and add the user to the new Room.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - A VC_RoomSizeResponseGameEvent with the desired size of the event.

    • handleEvent

      public void handleEvent​(CC_NewGameResponseEvent event)
      This method handle a CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent and readmit the client to the Lobby. If the server is full (no rooms available) the method send a CV_ReconnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent to the client with errorCode: "ROOM_FULL". If another player is creating a Room the method send a CV_ReconnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent to the client with errorCode: "WAIT_FOR_CREATION". If every room is full but the server can manage a new room, the method send a CV_RoomSizeRequestGameEvent to the client asking the desired size of the room. If there's an available Room, the method add the client to the Room.
      Specified by:
      handleEvent in interface ControllerListener
      Parameters:
      event - A CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent with the info about the client.

    • addUserToRoom

      private void addUserToRoom​(java.lang.String username, VirtualView virtualView) throws NotFreeRoomAvailableException
      Add the user to the the first free room.
      Parameters:
      username - Username chosen by the user
      virtualView - VirtualView of the user
      Throws:
      NotFreeRoomAvailableException - if there aren't FreeRoomAvailable

    • createNewRoom

      private void createNewRoom​(java.lang.String username, VirtualView virtualView)
      Ask the user a specific size of the room. Uses the creatingRoomLock Lock.
      Parameters:
      username - Username chosen by the user
      virtualView - VirtualView of the user

    • sendConnectionRejectedEvent

      private void sendConnectionRejectedEvent​(CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent event, java.lang.String errCode, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Send a CV_ConnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent event with the given error code.
      Parameters:
      event - A CC_ConnectionRequestGameEvent with the info about the client and the user.
      errCode - The error code to add to the event.
      errorMessage - The message to send with the event.

    • sendReconnectionRejectedEvent

      private void sendReconnectionRejectedEvent​(CC_NewGameResponseEvent event, java.lang.String errCode, java.lang.String errorMessage)
      Send a CV_ReconnectionRejectedErrorGameEvent event with the given error code.
      Parameters:
      event - A CC_NewGameResponseEvent with the info about the client and the user.
      errCode - The error code to add to the event.
      errorMessage - The message to send with the event.

      Parameters:
      username - Username of disconnecting user

    • disconnectUserInARoom

      private void disconnectUserInARoom​(java.lang.String username) throws UserNotFoundException, RoomNotFoundException
      Disconnect a user in a Room and clean everything.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of disconnecting user
      Throws:
      UserNotFoundException - User not found
      RoomNotFoundException - Room not found

    • isPlayerInLobby

      private boolean isPlayerInLobby​(java.lang.String username)
      Check if the player is in this Lobby.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the player whose presence you want to check.
      Returns:
      true if the player is in this Lobby, false otherwise.

    • isUserInARoom

      private boolean isUserInARoom​(java.lang.String username)
      Check if the player is in this Lobby AND in a Room.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the player whose presence you want to check.
      Returns:
      true if the player is in this Lobby AND in a Room, false otherwise.

    • getRoomWithUser

      private Room getRoomWithUser​(java.lang.String username) throws RoomNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException
      This method find the Room containing the give User.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of the player.
      Returns:
      The Room containing the user.
      Throws:
      RoomNotFoundException - if there aren't Rooms that contain the given username.
      UserNotFoundException - when the user is not is the Lobby list of user.

    • isRoomFull

      private boolean isRoomFull​(Room roomToCheck)
      This method check if the given Room is full or not
      Parameters:
      roomToCheck - The Room to check if is full or free
      Returns:
      true if the room is full, false otherwise

    • allRoomsAreFull

      private boolean allRoomsAreFull()
      This method check if all rooms are full
      Returns:
      true if all rooms are full, false if at least one is free

    • firstFreeRoom

      private Room firstFreeRoom() throws NotFreeRoomAvailableException
      This method check if there is a free room. If yes, it return the room, else should throw an exception
      Returns:
      The first Room available
      Throws:
      NotFreeRoomAvailableException - if there aren't rooms available

      Check if the PreGame can start or not in the room containing the given player.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of a player
      Returns:

    • canStartGameForThisUser

      public boolean canStartGameForThisUser​(java.lang.String username)
      Check if the PreGame can start or not in the room containing the given player.
      Parameters:
      username - Username of a player
      Returns:
      true if each player has placed his workers and the Game can start, false otherwise
